review: We were using Netflix and it worked great, then we wanted to try Amazon Fire because we would have more programs to choose from. Our internet provider is not the speediest but it works well with Netflix but not at all with Amazon Fire. We wanted to evaluate it so we didn't return it right away and when we tried it said we only had 30 days to return it, Bye Bye $100.00 on a product that never worked.
